DOC.brief_title: Anthropometric , Metabolic , Cardiovascular Symptomatic Profile Postmenopausal Women
DOC.detailed_description: When age , body composition change , lead reduction muscle mass strength , increase total body fat . These body composition change especially observe postmenopausal woman , due hormonal change take place . After menopause , gynoid fat distribution fat deposit gluteo-femoral region change android fat distribution increase upper body fat , especially abdominal region . These consequence menopause associate decrease aerobic capacity reduce total energy expenditure may lead metabolic syndrome ( MetS ) . The aim study investigate anthropometric , metabolic , cardiovascular symptomatic profile gynoid android postmenopausal woman .
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal woman Caucasian 5060 year age Neurological disease Pulmonary disease Cardiac disease Oncological disease Musculotendinous articular injury Hormone replacement therapy Cigarette smoking
